Panel.onload: AsyncEvent( 0.1, RemoveStyle( AbilitiesScene, Dark ) ); AsyncEvent( 0.1, AddStyle( UIElements, MakeVisible ) );

Panel.onactivate: DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( AbilitiesScene, block00_ult, SetAnimation, button_press ); DOTAAbilityDraftSelectAbility(36);
DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( AbilitiesScene, block01_ult, SetAnimation, button_press );DOTAAbilityDraftSelectAbility(42);
